# Simple Checklist Issue Template

For SIMPLE tier tasks - single issue with checkbox list.

## Template

```markdown
## Overview

{{description}}

## Tasks

{{#each tasks}}
- [ ] {{this.name}}
{{/each}}

## Verification

| Type | Details | Expected |
|------|---------|----------|
{{#each verification}}
| {{this.type}} | {{this.details}} | {{this.expected}} |
{{/each}}

## Context

- **Complexity:** SIMPLE ({{score}}/15)
- **Created by:** /brainstorm
- **Date:** {{date}}

---
*Generated by fyrsmithlabs github-planning*
```

## Usage

```bash
gh issue create \
  --title "{{title}}" \
  --label "task" \
  --body "<populated template>"
```

## Field Mapping

| Field | Source |
|-------|--------|
| `description` | Brainstorm design summary |
| `tasks` | Design checklist items |
| `verification` | Auto-generated from task types |
| `score` | Complexity assessment total |
| `date` | Current date ISO format |
